metadata.title: CVE-2020-4033 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In FreeRDP before version 2.1.2, there is an out of bounds read inRLEDECOMPRESS. All FreeRDP based clients with sessions with color depth <32 are affected. This is fixed in version 2.1.2.

criterions.comment: freerdp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
